title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Planning & Management Documents
body: Planning & Management Documents       Management Plans The following files are in Adobe Reader format or Portable Document Format (pdf). If you do not have the software to view these files, download it.  General Management Plan, 4,400 KB pdf Environmental Assessment of the Subsurface Management Plan, 344 KB pdf Finding of No Significant Impact - Subsurface Management Plan, 87 KB pdf  Subsurface Plan Additions, 212 KB pdf Public Release of Subsurface Management Plan, 520 KB pdf
